author: Mitchell Hang

text: I think some of you may have heard this theme already, it's from some sports game. Seriously though, Wii Sports was such a massive phenomenon that almost eveyrone around the world, grandmas included, tried this game at least once. Still to this day, the Wii is the only time I waited long hours pre-launch in front of the store to get my hands on it, and while it didn't end up living up to my expectations, this game was absolutely great and provided tons of entertainment with friends and family. Bowling and tennis, especially. Seeing your Miis in the game and the motion controls really felt refreshing. Even if it was bundled with the Wii (except in Japan), it's still impressive that this is the 3rd best selling game of all time (behind Tetris and Minecraft), and the single best selling game of all time for a single platform.
author: SupraDarky

text: Ah, I always thought that this game's music deserved some notice. The bowling theme is really great as well in my opinion.
